name: FlowBoard AIOS Agent Commands
description: AI-Orchestrated System commands for FlowBoard story development cycle

skills.name: aios-help
skills.description: Show available AIOS commands and agent information

skills.name: aios-status
skills.description: Show current story/project status and phase

skills.name: aios-rules
skills.description: Show AIOS framework rules and constraints

skills.name: create-story
skills.description: Create new story from epic (Story Manager @sm)

skills.name: qa-gate
skills.description: Run 7-point quality checks on story (QA Engineer @qa)

skills.name: qa-loop
skills.description: Start iterative QA Loop when story fails Phase 4

skills.name: create-epic
skills.description: Create new epic from requirement (Product Manager @pm)

skills.name: push-code
skills.description: Push committed changes to remote (DevOps @devops ONLY)

skills.name: override-ids
skills.description: Override REUSE > ADAPT > CREATE (AIOS Master @aios-master ONLY)

agents.name: @dev
agents.description: Implements stories, marks progress, handles story file updates

agents.name: @qa
agents.description: Reviews code, runs quality gates, performs 7-point QA checks

agents.name: @sm
agents.description: Creates stories from epics with proper structure

agents.name: @po
agents.description: Validates stories against checklist, approves readiness

agents.name: @pm
agents.description: Creates epics, orchestrates features, writes specs

agents.name: @devops
agents.description: Exclusive authority: git push, PR creation, CI/CD, MCP management

agents.name: @aios-master
agents.description: Framework governance, rule enforcement, agent coordination

phases.4: QA - QA Engineer runs quality checks
